channel.title: Video Card Memory
channel.description: Okay, I was on [url]https://www.systemrequirementslab.com/cyri[/url] going through some of the games and I did Brink and it told me that I only have 750 MB of video RAM. Both my system information and my ATI Catalyst thing say I have 1 GB though and I'm confused. Anyone know what's up? I have one of the ATI HD5800 cards and can find the box if you need it to be more specific than that :stuck_out_tongue: .

item.title: Video Card Memory
item.dc:creator: King_Kaddo
item.description:
Normal ram is slow as shit compared to the onboard ram of the gpu.

Read full topic

item.title: Video Card Memory
item.dc:creator: player
item.description:
It tells me I have 3.1GB on my onboard HD 3300 when I only have 384MB. It also says I only have 7.7GB of RAM when I should read a full 8GB.

Read full topic

item.title: Video Card Memory
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
bobbo:

System memory can share with video cards.

How do you do this with a card? I know how to do it to onboard, but yeah…

Read full topic

item.title: Video Card Memory
item.dc:creator: finger
item.description:
i think it´s because your system was using 250 mb of video memory, so, your 1gb vga only shows 750mb there.
But i really don´t know

Read full topic

item.title: Video Card Memory

item.description:
Huh, then I should have plenty since I’m only using 50% of my system RAM at any one time :3 .

item.title: Video Card Memory

item.description:
Could be yes, so my GPU is borrowing some memory from my ram sticks for shared use.

AMIRIGHT?..

item.title: Video Card Memory
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
Grief Reaper:

It works ok for me. I have a gtx 460 768mb but on this test it shows as 2.5gb of video ram. In the directx diagnostic tool it shows as 2529mb of vidya ram!!!

why don’t manufacturers sell my card as a 2.5gb version, or is it a nvidia thing. :jizz:

Could it mean that you have RAM dedicated to video, so it´s taking in consideation your GPU memory + dedicated ram for video?

Read full topic

item.title: Video Card Memory

item.description:
It works ok for me. I have a gtx 460 768mb but on this test it shows as 2.5gb of video ram. In the directx diagnostic tool it shows as 2529mb of vidya ram!!!

why don’t manufacturers sell my card as a 2.5gb version, or is it a nvidia thing. :jizz:
